plot: Could you tell the truth if it would turn everyone against you? It is a choice Rosa never wanted to face, but the inevitable is out of your control when emotions are involved.
title: Rosa
plot_es: Could you tell the truth if it would turn everyone against you? It is a choice Rosa never wanted to face, but the inevitable is out of your control when emotions are involved.
plot_en: Could you tell the truth if it would turn everyone against you? It is a choice Rosa never wanted to face, but the inevitable is out of your control when emotions are involved.
